document_title: Difficulty breathing, shortness of breath: Causes, symptoms and treatments
subsection_content: Shortness of breath is a result of hypoxia or hypoxemia, i.e. low oxygen levels in the blood. Therefore, if you are subjective to this condition without any treatment, the brain will not be provided with enough oxygen to function for a long time, leading to temporary or permanent cognitive impairment. Along with that comes a series of other dangerous complications such as brain damage, brain necrosis, stroke...
subsection_data:
kho tho.json. Symptoms
Shortness of breath is a result of hypoxia or hypoxemia, i.e. low oxygen levels in the blood. Therefore, if you are subjective to this condition without any treatment, the brain will not be provided with enough oxygen to function for a long time, leading to temporary or permanent cognitive impairment. Along with that comes a series of other dangerous complications such as brain damage, brain necrosis, stroke...
